message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, thanks for your interest. I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is really the lowest I can go.
I'm still interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,000?
